codeSystems.name: ProcedureCodes(SNOMEDCT)
codeSystems.title: Procedure Codes (SNOMED CT)
codeSystems.description: Procedure Code: All SNOMED CT procedure codes.
codeSystems.StructureDefinition-r2bo-solicitud-infor: Perfil de Solicitud de Informe de Anatomía Patológica

codeSystems.name: TNMStageGroupStagingTypeVS
codeSystems.title: TNM Stage Group Staging Type Value Set
codeSystems.description: Identifying codes for the type of cancer staging performed, i.e., clinical, pathological, or other, for AJCC stage group observation.

codeSystems.name: TNMStageGroupVS
codeSystems.title: TNM Stage Group Value Set
codeSystems.description: Result values for cancer stage group using TNM staging following AJCC staging guidelines. This value set contains SNOMED-CT equivalents of AJCC codes for Stage Group, according to TNM staging rules.

codeSystems.name: TNMStagingMethodVS
codeSystems.title: TNM Staging Method Value Set
codeSystems.description: Staging method used for AJCC TNM staging, e.g., AJCC 8th edition, UICC 7th edition, etc.
codeSystems.StructureDefinition-r2bo-categoria-tnm.h: Perfil de Origen para las Categorías T, N,  M (Abstracto)

codeSystems.name: TumorSizeUnitsVS
codeSystems.title: Tumor Size Units Value Set
codeSystems.description: Acceptable units for measuring tumor size

codeSystems.name: LOINCAnswersLL4348-0
codeSystems.title: LOINC Answer Codes for LL4348-0

codeSystems.name: Hl7VSRelevantClincialInformation
codeSystems.title: hl7VS-relevantClincialInformation
codeSystems.description: Value Set of codes that specify additional clinical information about the patient or specimen to report the supporting and/or suspected diagnosis and clinical findings on requests for interpreted diagnostic studies.

codeSystems.name: CaracteristicasMargenQuirurgicoVS
codeSystems.title: Set de Valores de Caracteristicas del Margen Quirurgico
codeSystems.description: Set de valores del nivel de compromiso del margen quiurgico en un reporte de biopsia
